examples.title: Style labels with local fonts
examples.description: Apply local fonts to your style’s text labels. This option is suitable if you don’t need every user to see exactly the same font, or if you want to avoid relying on a third-party content delivery network (CDN). For maximum compatibility, the text-font property should include fonts commonly found on multiple platforms.
examples.titleCn: 样式化 labels with local fonts
examples.descriptionCn: Apply local fonts to your style’s text labels. This option is suitable if you don’t need every user to see exactly the same font, or if you want to avoid relying on a third-party content delivery network (CDN). For maximum compatibility, the text-font property should include fonts commonly found on multiple platforms.

examples.title: Style labels with Web fonts
examples.description: Apply Web fonts to your style’s text labels. Unlike signed distance field (SDF) glyph sets, Web fonts are available from a variety of providers, or your can make your own using popular tools. This option is suitable for fonts that are only available through a third-party content delivery network (CDN) for technical or legal reasons, as well as fonts that are incompatible with SDF, such as variable fonts. For compatibility with Android and iOS applications, specify equivalent fonts in the style’s font-faces property.
examples.titleCn: 样式化 labels with Web fonts
examples.descriptionCn: Apply Web fonts to your style’s text labels. Unlike signed distance field (SDF) glyph sets, Web fonts are available from a variety of providers, or your can make your own using popular tools. This option is suitable for fonts that are only available through a third-party content delivery network (CDN) for technical or legal reasons, as well as fonts that are incompatible with SDF, such as variable fonts. For compatibility with Android and iOS applications, specify equivalent fonts in the style’s font-faces property.

examples.description: Toggle deck.gl layer using maplibre.
examples.descriptionCn: Toggle deck.gl layer using maplibre.

examples.title: Toggle interactions
examples.description: Enable or disable UI handlers on a map.
examples.descriptionCn: Enable or disable UI handlers on a map.

examples.title: Update a feature in realtime
examples.description: Change an existing feature on your map in real-time by updating its data.
examples.titleCn: 更新 a feature in realtime
examples.descriptionCn: Change an existing feature on your map in real-time by updating its data.

examples.title: Use a fallback image
examples.description: Use a coalesce expression to display another image when a requested image is not available.
examples.descriptionCn: 使用 a coalesce expression to display another image when a requested image is not available.

examples.title: Use addProtocol to Transform Feature Properties
examples.description: Reverse country names with addProtocol in plain JavaScript.
examples.titleCn: 使用 addProtocol to Transform Feature Properties
examples.descriptionCn: Reverse country names with addProtocol in plain JavaScript.

examples.title: Use locally generated ideographs
examples.description: Set localIdeographFontFamily to override the font used for displaying CJK (Chinese, Japanese and Korean) characters, ignoring the map style. This setting must be a CSS font rule specifying fallbacks of on-device fonts. Set localIdeographFontFamily to false to use server-provided fonts, which is much slower.
examples.descriptionCn: Set localIdeographFontFamily to override the font used for displaying CJK (Chinese, Japanese and Korean) characters, ignoring the map style. This setting must be a CSS font rule specifying fallbacks of on-device fonts. Set localIdeographFontFamily to false to use server-provided fonts, which is much slower.

examples.title: Variable label placement with offset
examples.description: Use text-variable-anchor-offset to allow high priority labels to shift position to stay on the map.
examples.descriptionCn: 使用 text-variable-anchor-offset to allow high priority labels to shift position to stay on the map.

examples.title: Variable label placement
examples.description: Use text-variable-anchor to allow high priority labels to shift position to stay on the map.
examples.descriptionCn: 使用 text-variable-anchor to allow high priority labels to shift position to stay on the map.

examples.title: View a fullscreen map
examples.description: Toggle between current view and fullscreen mode. Does not work on iPhones because a pseudo-fullscreen is used, and the code is embedded in an iframe, which prevents the map from scaling.
examples.descriptionCn: Toggle between current view and fullscreen mode. Does not work on iPhones because a pseudo-fullscreen is used, and the code is embedded in an iframe, which prevents the map from scaling.

examples.title: View local GeoJSON (experimental)
examples.description: View local GeoJSON with experimental File System Access API.
examples.descriptionCn: View local GeoJSON with experimental File System Access API.

examples.title: View local GeoJSON
examples.description: View local GeoJSON without server upload.
examples.descriptionCn: View local GeoJSON without server upload.

examples.title: Visualize population density
examples.description: Use a variable binding expression to calculate and display population density.
examples.descriptionCn: 使用 a variable binding expression to calculate and display population density.

examples.title: Zoom and planet size relation on globe
examples.description: Explanation of zoom and planet size relation under globe projection and how to account for it when changing the map center and zoom by some delta.
examples.titleCn: Zoom and planet size relation on globe
examples.descriptionCn: Explanation of zoom and planet size relation under globe projection and how to account for it when changing the map center and zoom by some delta.
